description: This is a Python source file implementing a placeholder function for repositioning subtitles in a video. It defines a public interface to adjust subtitle positions to avoid overlap, mainly used as a stub for future implementation.

methods.name: List[Tuple[float,float,str,str]] reposition_subtitles_for_video( video_path: str, subtitles: List[Tuple[float, float, str]], )
methods.description: Repositions subtitles to avoid overlap with burnt-in text by toggling position between 'top' and 'bottom' for each subtitle entry.

ctags.name: reposition_subtitles_for_video
ctags.signature: ( video_path: str, subtitles: List[Tuple[float, float, str]], )
